title: Dark Knight
overview: The story takes place in England in the year 1193, with the land reduced to submission under the weight of constant foreign invasions and the capture of their true King Richard the Lionheart. Each episode follows the journey of Ivanhoe battling against the fake King's tyranny and oppression and the dark arts of his necromancer named Mordour. Join Ivanhoe accompanied by the beautiful healer/swordfighter Rebecca and apprentice sorcerer Odo in their exciting epic adventure into the Dark Ages with their fight against supernatural evil and absolute dictatorship.
